body:
1.JsonUitls.toMap (string JSON) the parameter values are checked for null both inside and outside the method, and the code is repeated.

---
1. JsonUitls.toMap(String json) 针对参数值在方法内和方法外都进行校验空，进行了2遍校验，代码是重复的。

> 1.JsonUitls.toMap (string JSON) the parameter values are checked for null both inside and outside the method, and the code is repeated.
> 
> 1. JsonUitls.toMap(String json) 针对参数值在方法内和方法外都进行校验空，进行了2遍校验，代码是重复的。

OK, I think double check is just an extra layer of protection. If it can guarantee that NPE will not occur, I think it is OK to remove the outer null check.

-------
Ok，我只是觉得double check只是多了一层防护，如果能保障不会出现npe的情况，我觉得去除外层check也是可以的。
From flink params source processing code, `其他参数`  will be add after the jar, so it will not take effect, @nauu please confirm the usage of `其他参数`. Can we change the order of `其他参数` in front of jar?

@dailidong @liuxuedongcn 

我想请教下，首先是否邮件如果不设置、sql语句正确的前提下也是无法正确完成任务的对么？

假如是这样的话，那是不是不太合理，有些场景是无法配置这些信息的，类似我们现在做的都是在局域网内的项目，无法设置这些信息，那这个工具是不是就无法使用呢？真心请教！！！

if you choose python, main jar package choose your python file will be OK
sorry for misleading you, python should not use jar as package name, but it can work
please update/add title in English
@gabrywu Can you check this pr again?

> if you choose python, main jar package choose your python file will be OK
> sorry for misleading you, python should not use jar as package name, but it can work

Okay thank you!
But the python file cannot be recognized in the "main jar package" column, and because there is no main jar file, the task cannot be saved, and the result is that python cannot operate the spark task. It is worth mentioning that the upload function should not upload jar files.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45786444/90001593-3343bf00-dcc4-11ea-9155-3fe6e7c4f29a.png)
